INFO:
• 1. Enter the submission system:
  • 2. Check all your data on User Data
    • - Remember that the entry must be as AUTHOR
  • 3. Make the payment, which can be made through
    • - Commitment Note
    • - Credit Card
    • - Boleto
  • 4. Check if your article meets the specifications stated inevent website
  • 5. Create an IEEE Xplore compliant pdf version using thePDF eXpress, for this:
    • The. Go to:https://ieee-pdf-express.org/account/login
    • b. Create an account
      • - Conference ID: 53665X
      • - Complete with your data
    • รง. Submit the pdf file of your article in PDF eXpress toconversion
    • d. Check the status of the submission: if it was successful or ifsome changes are required.
    • and. A pdf version will be generated, check if everything is correct
  • 6. Return to the submissions system, and in the Submissions tab
    • a. Enter your accepted article
    • B. Place the document (same as used in the system registration) of theauthor/co-author who paid the registration
    • c. Click on: Submit or edit the final submission
      • - Check all submission data
      • - Add the generated pdf file to PDF eXpress
      • - Click on Save
    • d. Click on: Copyright your article
      • - Click Submit
      • - Read carefully, and fill in the necessary data
